patthana21.18:4.1: Nahetuṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.18:5.1: Nahetuṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā hetu vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.18:6.1: Nahetuṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.18:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
